title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer currently generates and saves the absolute path instead of the expected relative path. For instance, if the report design is located at $project/test, the absolute path is stored instead of the relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design. For example, if the report design is in $project/test, the library path should be stored as a relative path.
SR:
1. Open BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design.
3. Include a library in the report.
4. Save the report design.
5. Verify that the library path is stored as a relative path, considering the location of the report design.
